name: MS21 Design
tag_list: blog, buzz, cms, google, iphone, launch, modx, new-website, open-source, portfolio, print, social-networking, twitter, web-apps, website, wordpress, your-new-website
overview:
MS21 Design is an energetic business offering full design and website development solutions to clients throughout Brighton, London and the South East. The organisation, which is based in Brighton, originally started out in 2005 and has over 5 years experience in designing printed media from reports, brochures, corporate identity across a wide range of business sectors. MS21 websites are built to the highest coding standards to ensure conformations to W3C accessibility standards. Tried and tested website designs are built and tested in all major browsers to ensure all the client’s users, where ever they are in the world, enjoy their website in the way it was meant to be.

MS21 enable clients to connect with the world through the world wide web, the company supplies businesses with professional website design solutions.

MS21 Design has a growing network of clients, situated around Brighton, including blue chip companies.
